summary: This document contains a summary of account transactions for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas for the period from October 1, 2015, to October 31, 2015. It details various debits and credits, including preauthorized debits for tax and payroll fees, as well as checks paid during the month.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is mentioned as the account holder associated with the Deutsche Bank account detailed in the document.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is referenced as a personal assistant for inquiries related to the account.

keyFacts: The document details account transactions for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas for October 2015.
Richard Kahn is identified as the account holder.
Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.
The account experienced various debits including tax and payroll fees.
The ending balance as of October 31, 2015, was $0.00.
